msg: HBASE-6173 hbck check specified tables only

author: szetszwo
msg: HADOOP-8469. Make NetworkTopology class pluggable.  Contributed by Junping Du

author: ieugen
msg: MAILBOX-181 - fix spring-mailbox test for hbase-mailox
- seems to be a bug when starting Minicluster from spring-mailbox test  without a hbase-sites.xml file - throws NPE
- removed log4j exclusion to avoid NoClassDefFound error

author: marvin
msg: Detect compilers via probing for pound-defines rather than pound-ifdefs
in Charmonizer code, so that we get the specified compiler rather than
the compiler Charmonizer was compiled with.

author: marvin
msg: Detect compiler argument style at runtime.
Derive the argument flag set using the compiler supplied to Charmonizer
at runtime rather than the compiler used to compile Charmonizer.
